Okay, so Simba and all other characters are Anthro versions of themselves in this world, and they also live like humans, they have houses, they have cars, and they have clothes, etc.

Now, of what of the children age group is Simba in, on a scale of age 0 to age 11. 12 to 19 are considered teenagers. and remember, in this realm, everyone ages as fast as humans do, so even a 1 year old lion cub will still look like a baby cub.

1311222.content:
Okay, so Simba's in preschool, in what's known as Pride Town. While there wasn't anything they held against other anthro creatures, this town was simply made up of Lion Families. Simba's not yet familiar with other anthro creatures. He is aware of what his fellow lions call feral creatures, which have four feet, instead of feet and hands, but most of the time, they were used for meat to eat, which he was still having trouble keeping down.

Now, here's another question. Is Nala the same age as Simba? or Is she older than Simba? She can still be a friend to him, even if she's older then him. Perhaps even his babysitter.

13112223.content:
Okay, so Nala is in her teenage years. She's old enough to babysit cubs, and Simba is the cub she loves to babysit the most. Toddling around in his cute little diaper or pull-ups, which he switched between. Sometimes Sarafina would be his babysitter, but Nala would still help out. Simba honestly thought of them as family to him, since the both let him breastfeed from them. They even baby him when he's at their place. And he loves the treatment.

Now here's a question, are his parents, Sarabi and Mufasa the loving parents we all know, and approve of Sarafina and Nala's care they give Simab, and would be close friends with Sarafina and Nala, should Simba end up in Sarafina or Nala's tummy? Or are the a bit neglectful of Simba, that he is usually happy when his parents take him to see Nala and Sarafina, so he gets away from their neglectful nature? Perhaps Simba has come to live with Nala and Sarafina, and will eventually end up in one of their wombs.
13112223.title: She's old enough to babysit him. She even n...

choices: "Take you to Nala to have Sis's milk?"
"Get you some nuggets?" He can eat his own food.
"Give you some mashed deer?" She feeds him babyfood style.
"Have Mama feed you while your in her tummy?" Unbirth is known, even Simba knows
131122232.content:
It had been a difficult road, but they had finally done it. Sarafina had gained legal custody of Simba. Mufasa and Sarabi had been sentenced to banishment from Pride Town and all the surrounding towns and cities within the state. Taka, whom most knew as Scar had long since passed away, so Simba had no other living relatives to look after him after his parents lost custody of him. And Sarafina had signed the papers to become his legal guardian. She promised to love and care for him as much as possible. As did Nala. After acquiring Simba's personal belongings, the city had the house demolished and become a yard extension of Sarafina's place, having lived right next door to Sarabi and Mufasa. As the city started the construction to turn it into Sarafina's yard extension, Sarafina carried Simba into her house. He had fallen asleep on her shoulder, and was cutely sucking away on his thumb. She had already prepared a room for Simba, and had it designed so that he could gain access to her's and Nala's rooms, but also so it could be his personal nursery, being babied up and all, but allowing him some of a typical 4 year old's assortments of toys and such. She even had a TV and movies for his age group in the room, but she also had it so that, when he wanted to be babied, Sarafina was able to baby him. Diapers, a crib, bottles for when he wanted her and/or Nala's milk in the bottle, a chair to sit in to breastfeed Simba. pacifiers styled for boys, the works. And in their town they encouraged toddlers to stay baby like and hold on to their childhood, so most still wore diapers, even if they were potty training. But for Simba, pull ups and diapers were required, due to his undernourishment, his bladder had been underdeveloped, so, he wet himself more often then not, and didn't realize it. But none of the friends he had at preschool gave him a hard time about it. In fact, they made sure they used their padding to make him feel better. And the other parents approved, knowing it wasn't because their little ones were rebels, but because they were trying to help a friend. And Simba was thankful for it.

As Sarafina entered Simba's room, he woke up. "Hey there sleepy head, how are you feeling?" Sarafina asked.

"I otay. Um Sawafina. Is it otay if I call you Mama now?" Simba asked.

"Of course sweetie, and you can call Nala sis if you wish. We are you family now, after all," Sarafina said before kissing him.

He giggled and replied, "Thank you Mama."

Just then, they both heard Simab's tummy growl and he blushed. "I see a little cub needs his breakfast. Do want Mama to......."
131122232.title: Simba's now Sarafina's son. Nala's brother.

135333333332212.content:
Okay, so you noticed that this wasn't the Lion King you remembered from the movies. The Lions and Lionesses you recognize are all walking on two feet, they have furry hands where their front paws once were, and they are wearing cloths. The Lionesses have breasts similar to humans, instead of the standard 4 nubs you see on a feral lioness who is nursing cubs. They still had heads, fur and tails of lions, and their feet still sported claws that retracted, but other than that, they were different from the movie. For one, they didn't live in some mountain in the Pridelands. Infact, you saw many houses, some regular size, some the size of a mansion.

Now, before we have you actually bump into one of these lionesses to end up in their tummy, are you still human, or had the trip to this world via however it happened, transformed you into a lion cub?
135333333332212.title: They walk on two feet. (Anthro)

info.brief_description: Lion King characters are hungry... in more ways then one.
info.description:
So, you get to decide among the Lion King Characters who gets to consume and who gets consumed.

Things allowed in this story:
1. Soft vore (Oral, Breast and Anal)
2. Unbirth (Cock vore is allowed as long as it leads to a character getting sent to a females womb.
3. Anthro versions of the cast for one storyline.
4. Age regression.
5. Diapers (only in the Anthro version story line. And don't go into detail about diaper usage.)
6. Breastfeeding.
7. Having you become the main character for one storyline.
8. Shrinking of any character.
9. Pregnancy of course.
10. Adding OCs to the story.
11. Transformation
12. Lesbians, single or couple.
13. gender swap in the womb.
14. babying
15. including characters from the Lion Guard

Things not allowed in this story:
1. Hard vore.
2. Death.
3. Digestion or Absorbsion.
4. Blood and Gore. (Small mentions of one Character minor wounding another is okay.)
5. Torture
6. Herms.
7. Gay male couples.
8. gays males in general
9. gender swaps to make a gay couple.
10. gender swaps outside the womb.

If there are other things you may want to try that may not have been listed, feel free to ask me on online email. If rules are bent or broken, chapters will be deleted. Help me get to at least 60 chapters. thank you.
